templates.template:
{$title}
{$forumStatistics.threads|number} {{ phrase('threads') }}
{$forumStatistics.messages|number} {{ phrase('messages') }}
{$forumStatistics.users|number} {{ phrase('members') }}
{{ phrase('latest_member') }}

</xf:comment>

.xentr-forum-statistics 
{
	display: flex;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
	align-items: center;
		
	.contentRow 
	{
		flex: 1;
		flex-direction: column;
		margin: @xf-paddingSmall;
		border-radius: @xf-borderRadiusMedium;
			
		&.count--threads 
		{
			.xf-xentr_forumStatisticsThreads();
		}
			
		&.count--messages 
		{
			.xf-xentr_forumStatisticsMessages();
		}
			
		&.count--users 
		{
			.xf-xentr_forumStatisticsMembers();
		}
			
		&.latest-member 
		{
			.xf-xentr_forumStatisticsLatestMember();
		}
			
		.contentRow-figure 
		{
			<xf:if is="property('styleType') == 'light'">
			border-bottom: @xf-borderSize solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
			<xf:else />
			border-bottom: @xf-borderSize solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
			</xf:if>
				
			i 
			{
				font-size: {{ property('xentr_forumStatisticsIconSize')}}px;
				padding: @xf-paddingLargest 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
		}
			
		.contentRow-main 
		{
			display: flex;
			flex-direction: column;
			justify-content: center;
			align-items: center;
			padding: @xf-paddingMedium 0;
			<xf:if is="property('styleType') == 'light'">
    		background-color: fade(@xf-paletteNeutral3, 15%);
			<xf:else />
			background-color: fade(@xf-paletteNeutral1, 15%);
			</xf:if>
				
			.statistics-count
			{
				.xf-xentr_forumStatisticsCounts();
			}
				
			.statistics-title 
			{
				.xf-xentr_forumStatisticsTitle();
			}
		}		
	}
		
	// Latest member	



	.latest-member 
	{
		flex: 100%;
    	flex-direction: inherit;
		overflow: hidden;
				
		.contentRow-figure 
		{
			width: 55px;	
		}
			
		.contentRow-main 
		{
			align-items: flex-start;
    		padding-left: @xf-paddingLarge;
		}
			
		.contentRow-title 
		{
			width: 100%;
			.m-overflowEllipsis();
					
			a 
			{
				color: @xf-xentr_forumStatistics--color;
			}
		}
	}	
}

@media (min-width: @xf-publicNavCollapseWidth)
{
	.p-body-content 
	{
		.xentr-forum-statistics 
		{
			.latest-member 
			{
				flex: 1;
    			flex-direction: column;
				
				.contentRow-figure 
				{
					width: auto;
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
